question_text: You need to create the process for salespeople. /nWhat should you do? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area. /nNOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

items.text: Deliver on a specific customer date
options: View the Location Code for available inventory
View the Item Availability by Periods
Check the Catalog on the Sales Line Details
answer: View the Item Availability by Periods
